detail.description: Bhagiradha Chemicals & Industries is an Agro Chemical Company in India involved in the manufacturing of insecticides, fungicides, herbicides etc. It was Promoted by late Sri S. Koteswara Rao, a former scientist of Indian Institute of Chemical Technology, Hyderabad in the year 1993.[1][2]
